Opportunities

Classes

Howard County offers a plethora of class opportunities and career academies that provide opportunities for students to explore career paths before their graduation. Here is a list of a few STEM career academies:

  • Aerospace Engineering
  • Architectural Design
  • Biotechnology
  • Computer Programming
  • Cybersecurity Networking
  • PLTW (Project Lead the Way) Engineering

Extracurriculars

Clubs vary based on school, so be sure to check what your school offers! Here's a list of some awesome clubs to check out:
FIRST Robotics Competition

  • Atholton
  • Glenelg
  • Hammond
  • Mt. Hebron

Vex Robotics
Science Olympiad
Girls Who Code
Math Team
It's Academic
Other Clubs:
  • Computer Science Club
  • Coding/Programming Clubs
  • Engineering
  • Maker Clubs
  • Future Health Professionals (HOSA)
  • Future Business Leaders of America (FBLA), etc.

Honor Societies

Honor societies typically reserve membership and applications to those who are upperclassmen. They are a great way to partake in community service and demonstrate passion for a subject

  • Math Honor Society (Mu Alpha Theta)
  • National Honor Society
  • Science National Honor Society
  • Technical Honor Society

Opportunities Beyond School

Internships
There are a variety of internships available in the area, including some specifically catered towards high school students!

  • American Society for Engineering Education's Science and Engineering Apprenticeship Program (SEAP)
  • Johns Hopkins University's ASPIRE Program

HoCo STEM 2019
